## ExtraAttrsTuple type

The first value is the name of the attribute the second value is the default and the third is the optional parse name from the dom via `node.getAttribute()`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ExtraAttrsTuple = [string, string, string?];
```
